## What is generative modelling?


Generative modeling is the process of learning the underlying distribution of a dataset so that we can generate new, realistic samples from it.

Efficient Sampling
High-Quality Sampling
Coverage
Well-behaved latent space
Disentangled latent space
Efficient likelihood computation
